methods.name: getNodeByKey
methods.description: Get the node with the given key

methods.name: getTickedNodes
methods.description: Get array of nodes that are ticked

methods.name: getExpandedNodes
methods.description: Get array of nodes that are expanded

methods.name: isExpanded
methods.description: Determine if a node is expanded

methods.name: expandAll
methods.description: Use to expand all branches of the tree

methods.name: collapseAll
methods.description: Use to collapse all branches of the tree

methods.name: setExpanded
methods.description: Expands the tree at the point of the node with the key given

methods.name: isTicked
methods.description: Method to check if a node's checkbox is selected or not

methods.name: setTicked
methods.description: Method to set a node's checkbox programmatically

events.name: update:expanded
events.description: Triggered when nodes are expanded or collapsed; Used by Vue on 'v-model:update' to update its value

events.name: lazy-load
events.description: Emitted when the lazy loading of nodes is finished

events.name: update:ticked
events.description: Emitted when nodes are ticked/unticked via the checkbox; Used by Vue on 'v-model:ticked' to update its value

events.name: update:selected
events.description: Emitted when selected node changes; Used by Vue on 'v-model:selected' to update its value

nodes.description: The array of nodes that designates the tree structure

node-key.description: The property name of each node object that holds a unique node id

label-key.description: The property name of each node object that holds the label of the node

children-key.description: The property name of each node object that holds the list of children of the node

no-connectors.description: Do not display the connector lines between nodes

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for selected nodes (from the Quasar Color Palette)

control-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
control-color.desc: Color name for selected nodes (from the Quasar Color Palette)

selected-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
selected-color.desc: Color name for selected nodes (from the Quasar Color Palette)

tick-strategy.description: The type of strategy to use for the selection of the nodes

ticked.description: Keys of nodes that are ticked

expanded.description: Keys of nodes that are expanded

no-selection-unset.description: Do not allow un-selection when clicking currently selected node

default-expand-all.description: Allow the tree to have all its branches expanded, when first rendered

accordion.description: Allows the tree to be set in accordion mode

no-transition.description: Turn off transition effects when expanding/collapsing nodes; Also enhances perf by a lot as a side-effect; Recommended for big trees

filter.description: The text value to be used for filtering nodes

filter-method.description: The function to use to filter the tree nodes; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

no-nodes-label.description: Override default such label for when no nodes are available

no-results-label.description: Override default such label for when no nodes are available due to filtering
